response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises unparalleled performance and durability. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and market demand, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your potential to appreciate the true value it holds. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 15000}
